member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.Critical(NLog.Fluent.LogBuilder,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Marks the event as being a critical occurrence.

member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.Tag(NLog.Fluent.LogBuilder,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds one or more tags to the event.
member.param: The tags to be added to the event.

member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.Identity(NLog.Fluent.LogBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the user's identity (ie. email address, username, user id) that the event happened to.
member.param: The user's identity that the event happened to.

member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.Identity(NLog.Fluent.LogBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the user's identity (ie. email address, username, user id) that the event happened to.
member.param: The user's identity that the event happened to.
The user's friendly name that the event happened to.

member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.MarkUnhandled(NLog.Fluent.LogBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Marks the event as being a unhandled occurrence and sets the submission method.

member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.MarkAsUnhandledError(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Marks the event as being a unhandled error occurrence.

member.name: M:Exceptionless.NLog.LogBuilderExtensions.SetSubmissionMethod(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: Sets the submission method that created the event (E.G., UnobservedTaskException)
